email_chain.subject: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, I hope this email finds you well. I’m reaching out regarding your inquiry for a crude oil shipment from Houston to Rotterdam. We have a suitable vessel, the MV Ocean Star, available for a laycan of October 15-20. The vessel has a DWT of 150,000 and an LOA of 280 meters. Our starting freight quote is in the low 50s, say $50.75 per metric ton. Let me know if this works for you or if you’d like to discuss further. Best regards, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, thanks for the quick response. The laycan works for us, but the freight rate is a bit on the higher side. Given the current market, we were hoping for something closer to $49.50 per metric ton. Also, could you confirm the demurrage rate? Looking forward to your reply. Cheers, John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, thanks for your feedback. I understand your position on the freight rate. After discussing with the owners, we can offer $50.00 per metric ton, which is a competitive rate given the vessel’s specifications and availability. The demurrage rate is $20,000 per day, pro rata. Let me know if this works for you. Best, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, thanks for the revised offer. We can agree to $50.00 per metric ton, provided the laycan remains firm and the demurrage rate is capped at $20,000 per day. Please confirm the vessel’s availability and send over the draft charter party for review. Regards, John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, great to hear that the terms are acceptable. The MV Ocean Star is confirmed for the laycan of October 15-20, and the demurrage rate is capped at $20,000 per day as agreed. I’ll have the draft charter party sent over to you by end of day. Thanks for your cooperation, and let me know if you need anything else. Best regards, Sarah
